Methods in sndlib.core.util that return types with arguments of type Link
static java.util.List<Link> NetworkUtils.getIncidentLinks(Node node, Network network)
          Determines all incident links of the given node.
static java.util.List<Link> NetworkUtils.getLinksByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> linkIds, Network network)
          Given a list of link ID's this method returns the corresponding Links in the specified network

If some link cannot be found in the network then this method returns null.
